phrs.translation: 神秘斗篷, 神秘披风, 神秘斗篷最高通缉

sentences.translation: 他们身穿扎染布衣服和披风。

sentences.sentence: Lose those ponchos, go and get your bibs!
sentences.translation: 丢掉那些雨布，去拿你的围嘴来！

sentences.sentence: The ponchos are indicative of the miserable weather the soldiers faced.
sentences.translation: 穿着的披风表明了战士们所面对的恶劣天气。
